alert.note: Alert for Bayfield; Douglas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 8:17PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Bayfield and central Douglas Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 817 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Port Wing, to near Foxboro, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Port Wing around 830 PM CDT. Herbster around 840 PM CDT. Solon Springs and Cornucopia around 845 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Chaffey, Wentworth, Cloverland, Amnicon Falls State Park, Bennett, Blueberry, Waino, Mouth Of Brule, Amnicon Lake and Lyman Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
